verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

“\w Only|strong="H7535"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.”
\w Can|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w without|strong="H1115"\w* agreeing where \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*?

Does \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w when|strong="H6963"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H3293"\w* \w no|strong="H1115"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*? \w Does|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* land \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w bait|strong="H4170"\w* has \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H5927"\w*? \w Does|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w trap|strong="H4170"\w* \w spring|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ground \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* has \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w catch|strong="H3920"\w*?

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w* \w sounds|strong="H8628"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tremble|strong="H2729"\w*? \w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w calamity|strong="H7451"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w caused|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w revealing|strong="H1540"\w* \w His|strong="H1540"\w* \w plan|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w His|strong="H1540"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3069"\w* lion \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w roared|strong="H7580"\w*—\w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*? \w The|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*—\w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*?

\w Proclaim|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* citadels \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Ashdod \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* citadels \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: “Assemble \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*; \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* unrest \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* city \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w acts|strong="H6217"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6217"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w*.”

“\w For|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w right|strong="H5229"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w They|strong="H3068"\w* store \w up|strong="H6213"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* citadels.”

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w An|strong="H4480"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w* \w will|strong="H3069"\w* \w surround|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* land; \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3069"\w* \w pull|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* strongholds \w and|strong="H3381"\w* plunder \w your|strong="H4480"\w* citadels.”

\w This|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w snatches|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* lion \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w legs|strong="H3767"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* piece \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* ear, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w rescued|strong="H5337"\w* having \w just|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w corner|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* cushion \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w couch|strong="H6210"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* \w against|strong="H5749"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w God|strong="H3069"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* destruction \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w off|strong="H1438"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ground.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* tear \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w winter|strong="H2779"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H5486"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5486"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* \w end|strong="H5486"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
